author: ieb
msg: the current web.gadgets.xml file in java/server/src/main/webapp/WEB-INF does not
comply to the web-2.3.dtd because it contains a listener before the filters.

author: ieb
msg: I would like to be able to build the java/samples through a profile, as you are currently able to do with the other java modules, so that I can run 'mvn -Psamples' or 'mvn -Pall,samples'.

author: ieb
msg: Changed scope of annotatons to provided to make them availalbe to build but remove them from the deployment.
The annotations are not required for runtime. Strangely compile scope implies runtime in maven.
